<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v1/audio-features/{{Id}}"}

>

Get audio feature information for a single track identified by its unique Spotify ID.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

>
</Heading>

>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
